title: Understanding Criteria in Queries
text: In the context of querying, criteria refer to the conditions or rules that data must meet to be selected or filtered. Think of it as a logical test that data must pass to be included in the results.

hintAnswer: logical rule by which data is tested and chosen
title: Defining Criteria
text: What is the definition of criteria in the context of querying a database?
choices: logical rule by which data is tested and chosen
method by which data is chosen to be displayed
